sentences.english: They were specifically designed after a comprehensive study of ergonomics.
sentences.chinese: 他们是经过特别设计，人机工程学全面的研究。

sentences.english: Becouse adopting the point of man-machine engineering, the environment quality is improved.
sentences.chinese: 采用人机工程学观点，改善环境质量。

sentences.english: The automotive ergonomic design is one of the important parts duringautomobiles design and development.
sentences.chinese: 汽车人机工程设计是车身设计开发过程中的重要环节。

sentences.english: The application of ergonomics in earth-moving machine.
sentences.chinese: 人机工程学在工程机械上应用的情况。

sentences.english: The forward /reverse switch is designed according to ergonomics allowing the one-handed operation.
sentences.chinese: 反转切换开关符合人机工程尺寸，可以单手切换操作。

sentences.english: DJ Products can help you determine your ergonomic needs.
sentences.chinese: DJ产品可以帮助您确定您的人机工程需求。

sentences.english: The industrial design and the human-machine engineering.
sentences.chinese: 工业设计与人机工程学。

sentences.english: We need intelligent propositions for the design as well as the ergonomy of the website.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要智能命题的设计，以及网站的人机工程学。

sentences.english: The industrial design and the human-machine en…
sentences.chinese: 工业设计与人机工程学。

sentences.english: In effect, that's the idea behind ergonomic design.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，这是一个很好的人机工程设计背后。

sentences.english: The development of ergonomics in designing and packaging for auto-body.
sentences.chinese: 人机工程在汽车车身布置设计上的研究发展。

sentences.english: How to identify the Ergonomics risk in Industry and Office?
sentences.chinese: 如何评估生产过程中和办公室内的人机工程风险？

sentences.english: Perfect man-machine engineering Unscrew perch pin ensures reliable connection.
sentences.chinese: 完美人机工程高位插脚防松设计，使插接更牢靠。

definition: glove compartment (of a car)/glovebox (sealed compartment with attached gloves for handling hazardous materials etc)
